item.title: 快递英雄将利用塔拉巴特公司首次公开募股回购 10 亿欧元债券
item.description: Delivery Hero SE 计划利用其中东子公司 Talabat 近期公开上市的收益，回购约 10 亿欧元（10 亿美元）的债券。【原文：Delivery Hero SE plans to buy back around €1 billion ($1 billion) of bonds using proceeds from the recent public listing of Talabat, its Middle Eastern unit.】

item.title: 联合利华预计 2025 年盈利能力将略有提升，并开始回购
item.description: 联合利华公司（Unilever Plc）预计 2025 年的盈利能力将略有改善，并已开始回购 15 亿欧元（16 亿美元）的股票。【原文：Unilever Plc expects a modest improvement in profitability in 2025 and has commenced a €1.5 billion ($1.6 billion) share buyback.】

item.title: 2024 年底英国经济增长，里夫斯意外缓刑
item.description: 英国在 2024 年底实现了出乎意料的经济增长，这是工党政府在经济指标一落千丈之后的一次缓和。【原文：Britain registered unexpected growth at the end of 2024, a reprieve for the Labour government after a woeful run of economic indicators.】

item.title: 菲律宾暂停宽松周期，发出即将下调巨额存款准备金率的信号
item.description: 菲律宾央行周四维持关键利率不变，在全球不确定性上升的情况下暂停了刚刚开始的宽松周期，尽管央行行长保证借贷成本将继续下降。【原文：The Philippine central bank kept the key interest rate unchanged on Thursday, pausing a nascent easing cycle on rising global uncertainties even as the governor assured that borrowing costs will continue to go down.】

item.title: 蔡崇信称苹果 iPhone 将在中国使用阿里巴巴人工智能技术
item.description: 中国苹果公司董事长表示，苹果公司的 iPhone 手机将在中国使用阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司的人工智能技术，这证实了有报道称这家电子商务先驱已在帮助 iPhone 手机方面获得了梦寐以求的角色。【原文：Apple Inc.’s iPhones will use Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.’s artificial intelligence technology in China, the Chinese firm’s chairman said, affirming reports that the e-commerce pioneer had scored a coveted role in helping power the iPhone.】

item.title: 日元期权预示着看涨货币押注的脆弱性
item.description: 仅用了一周时间，3000 多亿美元货币期权市场中日元走强的赌注就出现了裂痕。【原文：It took just a week for cracks to appear around wagers for a stronger yen in the $300 billion-plus currency options market.】

item.title: 阿联酋 IT 服务公司 Alpha Data 筹备在阿布扎比上市
item.description: 总部位于阿拉伯联合酋长国的阿尔法数据公司（Alpha Data）宣布了首次公开募股计划，中东地区的上市步伐正在加快。【原文：United Arab Emirates-based Alpha Data announced plans for an initial public offering, as listings across the Middle East gather pace.】

item.title: 风险偏好升温，亚洲高等级债券利差创下新低
item.description: 亚洲投资级美元债券的收益率溢价正创下历史新低，因为发行人的财务状况更加稳健，经济背景充满活力，促使投资者为获得更高回报而承担更多风险。【原文：Yield premiums on Asian investment-grade dollar bond are hitting record lows, as stronger issuer finances and a resilient economic backdrop prompts investors to take on more risks for higher returns.】

item.title: 本田和日产放弃合并谈判，承诺开展合作

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国第四季度经济意外增长 0.1%
非洲市场增长，Orange 销售额达到分析师预期
item.description: Orange SA 公布的第四季度营收略有增长，符合分析师的预期，这主要得益于中东和非洲地区的增长抵消了欧洲和企业业务的下滑。【原文：Orange SA reported fourth-quarter revenue that rose slightly, in line with analysts’ estimates, thanks to growth in its Middle East and African region offsetting declines in Europe and its enterprise business.】

item.title: 雀巢销售增长超预期，得益于价格上涨
item.description: 由于全球最大的食品制造商提高了价格，雀巢公司去年最后一个季度的销售增长超出了预期。【原文：Nestle SA sales growth exceeded expectations in the final quarter of last year as the world’s biggest foodmaker lifted prices.】

item.title: 据说保诚将聘请花旗集团进行 10 亿美元的印度 IPO
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，保诚集团已聘请花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：Prudential Plc has hired Citigroup Inc. to help work on a potential initial public offering of Indian unit ICICI Prudential Asset Management Co., according to people familiar with the subject.】

item.title: 泰铢涨势似乎将因贸易忧虑和股市低迷而失去动力
item.description: 由于全球贸易紧张局势升级和泰国股市低迷，泰国铢今年的涨势似乎已初露端倪。【原文：The rally in Thailand’s baht this year looks primed to peter out on escalating global trade tensions and a slump in the nation’s equities.】

item.title: 中国计划暂停在香港销售 30 年期人民币债券
item.description: 在长期中断后，中国将恢复在香港发行 30 年期政府债券，此举将有助于为加入人民币借贷热潮的离岸发行商树立一个基准。【原文：China is resuming issuance of 30-year government bonds in Hong Kong after a long hiatus, a move that will help set a benchmark for offshore issuers joining a boom in yuan borrowing.】

item.title: 金融科技亿万富翁金正日将接管哈萨克斯坦顶级贷款机构 Jusan
item.description: 金融科技亿万富翁维亚切斯拉夫-金（Vyacheslav Kim）正在等待监管部门的批准，以收购哈萨克斯坦一家顶级银行的控股权。【原文：Fintech billionaire Vyacheslav Kim is waiting for regulatory approval to buy a controlling stake in a top Kazakh bank that the previous owner had acquired with his help.】

item.title: 西门子因电气化需求增长而收入增加
item.description: 由于电气化产品的强劲需求抵消了工厂自动化设备销售的持续低迷，西门子公司第一财季的收入有所增长。【原文：Siemens AG’s revenue rose in its first fiscal quarter as robust demand for its electrification products offset an ongoing slump in sales of factory-automation equipment.】

item.title: 欧洲复兴开发银行称可再生能源是波兰降低电价的最佳选择
item.description: 欧洲复兴开发银行称，波兰若想迅速降低能源支出并取代即将停产的燃煤电厂，就应提高可再生能源发电能力。【原文：Poland should ramp up its renewable capacity if it wants to quickly cut energy bills and replace soon-to-be-defunct coal-fired plants, according to the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development.】

item.title: 特朗普与普京就结束乌克兰战争举行会谈，美元下跌
item.description: 由于乌克兰战争结束的前景抑制了对避险资产的需求，美元兑所有十国集团货币走软。【原文：The dollar weakened against all Group-of-10 currencies as prospects for an end to the war in Ukraine damped demand for haven assets.】

item.title: 激进的美国人在英格兰银行兴风作浪
item.description: 英格兰银行 2002 年的一份工作文件指出，制定货币政策的最佳方式是 "谨慎"。论文还指出，在不确定时期表现最好的中央银行是那些 "决策最不激进的中央银行"。【原文：The best way to set monetary policy is “to be cautious,” according to a Bank of England working paper from 2002. It goes on to say that the best-performing central banks during times of uncertainty were “those where decision making was least activist.”】

item.title: 太空公司卡曼首次公开募股融资 5.06 亿美元，定价高于区间
item.description: 卡曼控股公司（Karman Holdings Inc.【原文：Karman Holdings Inc., a maker of integrated systems for space and defense programs, and shareholders including Trive Capital raised $506 million in an initial public offering, pricing its shares above a marketed range.】

item.title: 中国热捧红利，房地产投资信托需求激增
item.description: 中国对收益率的需求几乎没有减弱的迹象，即使风险情绪已经开始复苏，房地产投资信托的疯狂购买就表明了这一点。【原文：Chinese demand for yield is showing few signs of abating even as risk sentiment has started to recover, as shown by the buying frenzy for real estate investment trusts.】

item.title: 印尼允许卖空以扩大股市吸引力
item.description: 印尼计划在今年第二季度引入卖空交易，以便在基准交易所略高于熊市水平时为投资者提供更多选择。【原文：Indonesia plans to introduce short-selling in the second quarter this year, to increase options for investors at a time when the benchmark exchange sits just above bear-market levels.】

item.title: 万科支撑后，中国开发商的涨势已然消退
item.description: 周四，中国开发商在信贷和股票市场的反弹中举步维艰，凸显了投资者希望政府采取更多措施帮助房地产行业的愿望。【原文：Chinese developers struggled to extend a rally in credit and share markets Thursday, underscoring investor desire for more government steps to help the property sector.】

item.title: 百度大步追赶，免费提供 "厄尼 "人工智能模型
item.description: 百度公司史无前例地宣布其 Ernie 人工智能模型免费向用户开放，此举可能有助于这家中国搜索巨头在开发下一代人工智能的竞赛中重获动力。【原文：Baidu Inc. has taken the unprecedented step of declaring its Ernie AI model free for users, a move that could help the Chinese search giant regain momentum in a race to develop next-generation artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 经济学家在韩国央行会议前下调韩国经济增长预期
item.description: 接受彭博社调查的经济学家在韩国央行召开会议决定政策的两周前下调了对韩国经济增长的预期，在央行行长为再次按兵不动敞开大门之后，这一事件看起来不那么像一次扣篮式的降息。【原文：Economists surveyed by Bloomberg lowered their estimates for South Korea’s economic growth two weeks before the central bank meets to decide policy, an event that looks less like a slam-dunk rate cut after the governor left the door open to another hold.】

item.title: 凯雷收购印度 Highway-Roop 汽车零部件平台
item.description: 凯雷集团完成了对印度汽车零部件制造平台的控股收购，该平台由 Highway Industries Ltd. 和 Roop Automotives Ltd. 合并而成。【原文：Carlyle Group Inc. completed its acquisition of a controlling stake in an Indian auto-parts making platform formed by the combination of Highway Industries Ltd. and Roop Automotives Ltd.】
